divs: Sighting DetailsThe craft was a perfect Charcoal color triangle with a round Azure Blue light at each cornor of the triangle. It was leisurly heading south down river. I had not time to view it but a few seconds because I had to pay attention to the traffic which was heavy due to a work project going on which narrowed the East bound traffic to one lane on the Bridge. When I had a chance to look again, I could not locate the craft and still had to return my eyes to the road. It was approximatly 9:30PM. After a meeting I was heading home from Bettendorf, Iowa to Moline, Illinois where I live.
Summary: On Ramp accessing Hwy. 74 Bridge that crosses Mississippi River from Bettendorf, Iowa to Moline, Illinois when I spotted a triangle craft above heading South above the river.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bettendorf
This sighting has never been favorited.
